text: Name: virginia virginia E-Mail: virginia.virginia@gmail.com Address: Suzhou, China Github: https://github.com/virginia LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/virginia Phone No. 291980411413 Summary:                                                                8 years of experience in Routing, Switching and Firewall Security, including hands-on experience in providing network support, installation and analysis for a broad range of LAN / WAN/MAN communication systems.
